title: How to Be a Cop in Grand Theft Auto (GTA) Vice City

steps.headline: Go to the police station in Washington Beach.
Enter the room on the left of the hallway.
steps.description: You’ll see a clothing icon near a baton.

steps.headline: Run through the clothing icon to change to a cop uniform.
Find either a police car or a SWAT van and get into one.
Start the “Vigilante” mission.
steps.description: A message on the screen will tell you which button to press to begin.

steps.headline: Chase a target.
steps.description: A marker will appear on your mini-map showing the location of your target. Chase down the target within the time limit. If successful, you’ll be rewarded with money and another target will appear on the map. There are 12 Vigilante missions. You’ll fail if you don’t catch the target within the time limit or spend more than a minute outside of a police vehicle.

text: Dress Like a Cop Complete the “Cop Land” mission first.  Go to the police station in Washington Beach.  Enter the police station.  Enter the room on the left of the hallway. You’ll see a clothing icon near a baton. Run through the clothing icon to change to a cop uniform.  Work Like a Cop Find either a police car or a SWAT van and get into one.  Start the “Vigilante” mission. A message on the screen will tell you which button to press to begin. Chase a target. A marker will appear on your mini-map showing the location of your target. Chase down the target within the time limit. If successful, you’ll be rewarded with money and another target will appear on the map. There are 12 Vigilante missions. You’ll fail if you don’t catch the target within the time limit or spend more than a minute outside of a police vehicle.
